articles.title: EU takes major step toward Russian oil ban, new sanctions - The Associated Press
articles.description: BRUSSELS (AP) — The European Union's top official on Wednesday called on the 27-nation bloc to ban oil imports from Russia and target the country’s biggest bank and major broadcasters in a sixth package of sanctions over the war in Ukraine .

articles.title: Russia targets train stations, weapons depots in latest deadly attacks in Ukraine - CBC News
